channel.description: Recent content in research on Academic

item.title: Two Papers accepted at CDC 19!
item.description: Two papers Supervisory Control of Discrete Event Systems in the Presence of Sensor and Actuator Attacks and Attack-Resilient Supervisory Control with Intermittently Secure Communication to appear in CDC 19 at Nice, France.

item.title: Paper accepted at EMSOFT 19!
item.description: Check our new paper on Statistical Verification of Hyperproperties for Cyber-Physical System.

item.title: Paper accepted by JCGS!
item.description: Paper A Logistic Factorization Model for Recommender Systems with Multinomial Responses accepted by Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics. Coming soon!
